verses.verse: "What<WH4100> a help<WH5826> you are to the weak<WH3808>!<WH3581> How you have saved<WH3467> the arm<WH2220> without<WH3808> strength!<WH5797>
"What<WH4100> counsel<WH3289> you have given<WH3289> to [one] without<WH3808> wisdom!<WH2451> What helpful<WH8454> insight<WH8454> you have abundantly<WH7230> provided!<WH3045>
"To whom<WH4310> have you uttered<WH5046> words<WH4405>? And whose<WH4310> spirit<WH5397> was expressed<WH3318> through<WH4480> you?
"The departed<WH7496> spirits<WH7496> tremble<WH9123> Under<WH8478> the waters<WH4325> and their inhabitants.<WH7931>
"Naked<WH6174> is Sheol<WH7585> before<WH5048> Him And Abaddon<WH11> has<WH369> no<WH369> covering.<WH3682>
"He stretches<WH5186> out the north<WH6828> over<WH5921> empty<WH8414> space,<WH8414> And hangs<WH8518> the earth<WH776> on nothing.<WH1099>
"He wraps<WH9503> up the waters<WH4325> in His clouds;<WH5645> And the cloud<WH6051> does not burst<WH1234> under<WH8478> them.
"He obscures<WH270> the face<WH6440> of the full<WH3677> moon,<WH3677> And spreads<WH6576> His cloud<WH6051> over<WH5921> it.
"He has inscribed<WH2328> a circle<WH2328> on the surface<WH6440> of the waters,<WH4325> At the boundary<WH8503> of light<WH216> and darkness.<WH2822>
"The pillars<WH5982> of heaven<WH8064> tremble,<WH9573> And are amazed<WH8539> at His rebuke.<WH1606>
"He quieted<WH9541> the sea<WH3220> with His power,<WH3581> And by His understanding<WH8394> He shattered<WH4272> Rahab.<WH7293>
"By His breath<WH7307> the heavens<WH8064> are cleared;<WH8235> His hand<WH3027> has pierced<WH9135> the fleeing<WH1281> serpent.<WH5175>

"Behold,<WH2005> these<WH428> are the fringes<WH7098> of His ways;<WH1870> And how<WH4100> faint<WH8102> a word<WH1697> we hear<WH8085> of Him! But His mighty<WH1369> thunder,<WH7482> who<WH4310> can understand<WH995>?"
